casebody.data:
In the Matter of EMAYKEW REALTY CORPORATION, Bankrupt. L. William Santasiere, as Trustee in Bankruptcy of Emaykew Realty Corporation, Bankrupt, Appellant No. 215. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 23, 1942. Dannenberg & Hazen, of New York City (Joseph Dannenberg, of New York City, on the brief), for trustee-appellant. Charles S. Port, of New York City, for appellee.

Before AUGUSTUS N. HAND, CLARK, and FRANK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court without prejudice to the bringing of any action that the trustee may be advised to bring based on an unlawful preference, if any.
